docs.snippet: Violent crimes — from homicides and rapes to robberies — have been on the rise in many major U.S. cities, yet experts can't point to a single reason why and the jump isn't enough to suggest there's a trend....
docs.lead_paragraph: Violent crimes — from homicides and rapes to robberies — have been on the rise in many major U.S. cities, yet experts can't point to a single reason why and the jump isn't enough to suggest there's a trend.

headline.main: US Cities See Unexplained Rise in Violent Crimes This Year
headline.print_headline: US Cities See Unexplained Rise in Violent Crimes This Year

docs.snippet: The knock on the door, strong and quick, jolted Barbara Hicks Collins awake. It was the middle of the night. Someone must be in trouble, she thought. She flung open her front door to the shocking sight of her car engulfed in flames....
docs.lead_paragraph: The knock on the door, strong and quick, jolted Barbara Hicks Collins awake. It was the middle of the night. Someone must be in trouble, she thought. She flung open her front door to the shocking sight of her car engulfed in flames.

headline.main: AP: Patchy Reporting Undercuts National Hate Crimes Count
headline.print_headline: AP: Patchy Reporting Undercuts National Hate Crimes Count

docs.snippet: Your daily look at late-breaking news, upcoming events and the stories that will be talked about Monday:...

docs.snippet: As the state’s open primary on Tuesday approaches, two Democratic women, one black and one Latina, are the leading contenders to advance to the November election....
docs.lead_paragraph: As the state’s open primary on Tuesday approaches, two Democratic women, one black and one Latina, are the leading contenders to advance to the November election.
docs.abstract: California Atty Gen Kamala Harris and Rep Loretta Sanchez, both Democrats, are main rivals in state's open primary to fill Sen Barbara Boxer's seat; situation reflects state's diversity and disarray of its Republican party; both candidates compete for crucial votes of Latinos, state's largest ethnic group.

headline.main: California Senate Race Is a Tale of Diversity and a Flailing G.O.P.
headline.print_headline: California Senate Race Is a Tale of Diversity and a Flailing G.O.P.

docs.snippet: Muhammad Ali traveled the world as a fighter and humanitarian, but he always came home to Louisville....
docs.lead_paragraph: Muhammad Ali traveled the world as a fighter and humanitarian, but he always came home to Louisville.

headline.main: Ali Became World Citizen but Never Forgot His Hometown Roots
headline.print_headline: Ali Became World Citizen but Never Forgot His Hometown Roots
